overview: When Colt kills the men that murdered his father, he escapes his pursuers and joins Wolf and his outlaw gang. After two years Wolf breaks up the gang, deeds his ranch to Colt, and turns himself in. Now an honest rancher, things are going fine for Colt until Wolf's old gang shows up under a new leader. Colt get the Governor to release Wolf claiming the two of them can bring in the gang.
tagline: HOUNDED BY GANGLAND'S GUNS...HUNTED BY THE AVENGING LAW...BOB RIDES THE TRAIL OF REVENGE!
title: Arizona Gunfighter
